channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Ok, i have a small problem with my 317 pi. Every time i try to run the server i end up getting this message/error/thingy.. And i do have jdk and jre downloaded and placed. I get this with the run.bat and the compiler.bat This...[/size] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/29ynvk5.png[/img]
[size=14pt]But i looked over my run.bat file... and it just doesnt look right to me... it looks like this.. [/size] [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit[/code]
[size=14pt]The last time i looked at the run.bat file i swear it looked different. Now i get this.. So idk if somethings fucked up... or my run.bat file is just messed up..[/size] ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
I also have this same problem trying to run my client. :( [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29qld9w.png[/img]
I looked over the file.. But i havent really edited my clients run.bat cuz i never had a reason to :P but it looks like this... same as the source.. Does this with the run.bat and compiler.bat
[code]@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]
[size=14pt]So it would be FUCKIN AWSOME if you would help me wit this :)[/size]

item.title: Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

[size=14pt]Ok, i have a small problem with my 317 pi. Every time i try to run the server i end up getting this message/error/thingy… And i do have jdk and jre downloaded and placed. I get this with the run.bat and the compiler.bat
This…[/size]

[size=14pt]But i looked over my run.bat file… and it just doesnt look right to me… it looks like this… [/size]

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit

[size=14pt]The last time i looked at the run.bat file i swear it looked different. Now i get this… So idk if somethings fucked up… or my run.bat file is just messed up…[/size]

I also have this same problem trying to run my client.

I looked over the file… But i havent really edited my clients run.bat cuz i never had a reason to
but it looks like this… same as the source… Does this with the run.bat and compiler.bat

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

[size=14pt]So it would be FUCKIN AWSOME if you would help me wit this :)[/size]

Read full topic
